io.janusproject.services.network

Interface NetworkService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DependentService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNetworkingExecutionThreadService, AbstractNetworkingService, NoNetworkService, ZeroMQNetworkService

    public interface NetworkService
extends DependentService
    This class enables the Janus kernel to send messages other the network.
    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NetworkService.NetworkEventReceivingListener
      Listener on events that are received from the network.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        Service.Listener, Service.State

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        void publish(io.sarl.lang.core.Scope<?> scope,
             io.sarl.lang.core.Event data)
      throws Exception
        Publish a data over the network.
        Parameters:
        scope - - scope of the published data.
        data - - data to propage over the network.
        Throws:
        Exception - - when the event cannot be published.

      • connectToRemoteSpaces

        void connectToRemoteSpaces(URI peerUri,
                           io.sarl.lang.core.SpaceID space,
                           NetworkService.NetworkEventReceivingListener listener)
                    throws Exception
        Connect this instance of kernel to the given peer over the network and for the given space.

        If the network service is not yet ready for connecting the given URI, this URI MUST be bufferized until the network service has been fully started.

        Parameters:
        peerUri - - the URI of the remote kernel to be connected to.
        space - - the identifier of the space to be connected to.
        listener - - listener on the receiving of the events.
        Throws:
        Exception - - when the peer cannot be connected.

      • disconnectFromRemoteSpace

        void disconnectFromRemoteSpace(URI peer,
                               io.sarl.lang.core.SpaceID space)
                        throws Exception
        Disconnect this peer from the given peer for the given space.
        Parameters:
        peer - - the URI of the remote kernel to be disconnected from.
        space - - the identifier of the space to be disconnected from.
        Throws:
        Exception - - when the peer cannot be disconnected.

      • disconnectPeer

        void disconnectPeer(URI peer)
             throws Exception
        Disconnect this peer from the given peer for all the spaces.
        Parameters:
        peer - - the URI of the remote kernel to be disconnected from.
        Throws:
        Exception - - when the peer cannot be disconnected.

      • getURI

        URI getURI()
        Replies the URI used by this network interface.
        Returns:
        the URI, or null if the network is not started.
